Hey bosses, sharing some improvements to the product over the past week! 🎉

💳 Card Updates

HSBC Premier Card on heymax has been updated to reflect miles instead of cashback. (Long overdue sorry!)

📜 Terms and Conditions Improvement

We’ve added additional terms on merchant pages to remind you to click “Shop With Max” and complete checkout for one item or trip booking at a time. This ensures you get your purchases tracked properly!

🛍 MCC data updates (based on Visa card maximiser data)

--> Decathlon Online MCC updated from 5691 to 5941.

As always, your feedback is invaluable! Drop by feedback.heymax.ai to share your thoughts or upvote others' suggestions. 

Thanks for being part of the journey, and have a fantastic weekend! 🎉

Bosses — in the spirit of continuous improvement, would like to share some updates we’ve made to the app in the past 1+ week. These are smaller improvements apart from feature launches, but we’re working on improving our process to constantly refine the smaller things. Will make it a point to share on a weekly basis what has been improved!

Past week’s improvements:
⚡ Improved loading speed when switching between tabs in the app (the page now doesn’t reload every time you go to a new tab)

💳 Linked cards on “Your cards” tab are now sorted dynamically by most recent transaction first

⏳ Time taken for approved transactions (e.g. voucher purchase miles) to show up in your miles history reduced from 1min+ to ~10s

🛍 MCC data updates (based on Visa card maximiser data)
--> Foodpanda: Primary MCC 5812 → 5814
--> Deliveroo: Primary MCC 5812 → 5814
--> Booking.com: Primary MCC 7011 → 4722

We’ll strive to make heymax 1% better everyday. We’re also working on responding to your feedback/suggestions more closely and will soon share a new format for you to share feedback which will make it easier for us to review and follow up. In the meantime, please keep the feedback coming! 🙏

Caviar course on Qatar Doha - Paris #dps

- flew SIN - DOH - CDG on Q Suites but only certain routes from DOH have caviar, including Paris (and Singapore, but only from Doha to Singapore and not Singapore to Doha)

- usually offered for lunch / dinner meal service flights, so breakfast or sleeper meal service flights might not have

- about 50% (caviar to pax ratio) is uplifted since caviar is but one of the starter courses. So if keen, ask for it early. I asked right after I got offered the pre departure drink and apparently got the last portion
